fields.title: SoC Portal
fields.abstract: Build a portal for Seasons of Code, involving both front-end and back-end design.
fields.description: The Seasons of Code Portal project aims to create a comprehensive online platform tailored for coding enthusiasts participating in various "Seasons of Code" events. This project encompasses both front-end and back-end design to provide a seamless and engaging experience for users. Through a thoughtfully designed user interface and robust backend infrastructure, the portal seeks to enhance the overall coding experience for participants during different Seasons of Code.
fields.timeline:
Week 1: Define project scope and objectives.
Week 2: Set up version control. Create the project structure. Initialize front-end development environment.
Week 3: Implement user authentication. Start basic user profiles. Begin front-end UI design.
Week 4: Develop coding challenge functionalities. Implement submission and evaluation on the back-end.
Week 5: Implement leaderboards. Enhance real-time updates in the front-end.
Week 6: Implement community features. Develop discussion forums and chat in the front-end.
Week 7: Implement notification system. Create admin dashboard. Develop content moderation tools on the back-end.
Week 8: Conduct testing. Perform bug fixes. Optimize design and interactions. Ensure security and scalability. Finalize documentation for deployment
